---
  title: "Friday Research Exploration & Education"
---

The MSUM Biosciences department hosts a bi-weekly event called Friday Research 
Exploration & Education, or "FREE"

FREE events provide an opportunity for students involved in research with 
Biosciences faculty to talk about their research. Events are informal and 
questions and discussion are encouraged. Anyone is welcome to attend.

FREE is held in Hagen Hall room 113 at 3 PM on Fridays, unless otherwise stated.

Click the name of a calendar event to see more details.
